message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 60/40 split ensures we both benefit from this opportunity.
Alice, your offer was tempting, but let's be practical. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  Considering the inflation, it makes sense to prioritize my share this round.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I'm equally deserving. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor this round to compensate for the inflation we've already experienced. Let's close this deal.
